item.title: Adventure Curriculum for Physical Education workshop
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437046102765{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]
Physical Education Workshop promotes interest in professional advancement for Physical Educators at the Elementary and Secondary levels. Through a comprehensive curriculum, the workshop provides opportunities for professional development in the areas of Physical Education, Health, Recreation and Dance.
[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Cal Poly" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437046118871{margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1435906073173{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]
Cal Poly is a nationally ranked, four-year, comprehensive public university located in San Luis Obispo, halfway between San Francisco and Los Angeles on Californiaâ€™s Central Coast. It is a distinctive learning community offering academically focused students a hands-on educational experience that prepares them for todayâ€™s scientific and technical world.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_tabs color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Tracie Arlington" tab_id="1437031484190-45131b5d-42f7"][vc_column_text]
Tracie Arlington is the owner and lead instructor of Play It Safe Defense. She is a black belt and nationally certified self-defense instructor with the Womenâ€™s Self-Defense Institute. Her program has been taught to over 50,000 children and teens since 2003. Tracie has been on the Dr. Phil Show and The Doctors TV as a childrenâ€™s self-defense expert. Currently she has been certifying middle and high school physical education teachers in San Diego County so they can teach self-defense to their students. Tracieâ€™s two major goals are; to have self-defense taught in physical education classes nationally and to help schoolâ€™s get the funding for the training. She has her B.A. Degree in Communications with an emphasis in training and public speaking.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Michele C. Blake" tab_id="1437031484540-8e1faf14-d9b1"][vc_column_text]
Jacque Bowman has taught and coached high school and middle school in San Ramon Unified School District for 28 years. She started the womenâ€™s golf programs at both San Ramon Valley High School and Dougherty Valley High. She is currently coaching at California High School and Pine Valley Middle Schools. Jacque is an avid golfer and will be playing in the NCGA Womenâ€™s Senior Championship this summer. She is a three time â€œChampion of Club Championsâ€ in the Pacific Womenâ€™s Golf Association Bay Area region. One of her favorite things is playing golf with her 85 year old dad, Bob. Thatâ€™s why she believes golf is the greatest game; golf is a lifelong sporting activity.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Tab" tab_id="1437046236183-ae07c778-b570"] [/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437044744674{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]
Critical Friends Groups (CFGs) are the product of a simple idea; providing deliberate time and structures to promote adult professional growth that is directly linked to student learning. CFGâ€™s provide educators and schools with specific tools, structures, and resources to support safe and effective collaborative learning linked to classroom practice.
[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Don`t get your ``Critical`` friend" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437044812505{margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1435906073173{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
Of value to all leaders in education, facilitative leadership skills, built through participation in CFGs, engage school communities in work worth doing, foster a focused school community, and build a collaborative and reflective culture in schools.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
CFG members are committed to making their practice public to one another, to being reflective, and to holding each other accountable for meeting the needs and interests of all students.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_tabs color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="CFG members" tab_id="1437031484190-45131b5d-42f7"][vc_column_text]
CFG members are committed to making their practice public to one another, to being reflective, and to holding each other accountable for meeting the needs and interests of all students. Â Through critical friendship, educators share resources and ideas
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Critical friendship" tab_id="1437031484540-8e1faf14-d9b1"][vc_column_text]
Through critical friendship, educators share resources and ideas, support each other in implementing new practices, and build relationships among colleagues characterized by mutual trust and freedom from judgment, while keeping a keen focus on issues of equity.Â They most often work in on-going, collaborative groups where they freely discuss each otherâ€™s practice with the intention of improving student learning.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Education School Technology Summit 2015
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437044159054{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]The Technology, Innovation, and Education (TIE) masterâ€™s program is home to creative leaders in education â€“ among both faculty and students. Together with outstanding fellow students from around the world, you will learn how to research and design new technologies and media that deliver powerful teaching and promote engaged learning.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437044191709{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]Technology is the Means, Not the MissionÂ  Everything we do in the TIE Program is grounded in teaching and learning. The first questions are always, â€œWho are the users, and what educational challenges are they grappling with?â€ We donâ€™t start with the goal of creating a sticky website, viral app, or immersive simulation. Instead, we choose the medium or technology that delivers the most effective learning experience for our specific goal. No previous computer science or technology experience is required to join TIE, only a passion for harnessing innovation and creativity to improve educational outcomes for all learners.[/vc_column_text][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Learning Network Webinars for Music Teachers
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437043358970{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]NAfME offers a full range of professional development opportunities for music teachers, including online development classes and webinars. Cutting edge information and top-notch music education resources â€“ this is where youâ€™ll find exactly what you need to succeed in the classroom.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Want some fresh new ideas? Come to a NAfME conference this year!" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437043369194{margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1435906073173{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text] Our Music Research and Teacher Education National Conference takes place every other year (biennial) and is designed for the needs of the higher education and research communities.Â  If youâ€™re interested in research-based poster sessions, lectures from nationally known speakers, and opportunities to attend multiple breakout sessions over several days, you donâ€™t want to miss this conference. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437031412623{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"] Auburn supports providing quality training for its teachers and staff surrounding the use of available technology within the district. [/vc_column_text][vc_tta_tabs color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Advantages" tab_id="1437031484190-45131b5d-42f7"][vc_column_text]The best thing about our online webinars and professional development classes?Â  You watch them when itâ€™s convenient for you! NAfMEâ€™s Learning Network delivers week-long workshops, as well as individual hour-long webinars, direct to your computer, or laptop.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Workshops" tab_id="1437031484540-8e1faf14-d9b1"][vc_column_text] Summer is the perfect time to continue your professional career development.Â  Just log on to watch one of NAfMEâ€™s summer workshop webinars, right in the comfort of your own home. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][vc_custom_heading text="Event will start in:" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437043585611{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][stm_color_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][stm_countdown datepicker="25-08-2015 15:45" label_color="#333333"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Digital Education Market Briefing: Minnesota 2015
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437031302200{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"] The Center for Digital Education is hosting a Market Briefing event in Seattle, WA and we hope you can join us. IT leaders from some of the largest districts in the state of Washington will be on hand for a special briefing on their technology plans for the coming years. [/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="This event will allow participants to:" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437031360211{margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1435906073173{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Hear directly from CIOs and technology leaders from area school districts
  • Network with fellow industry leaders in the region
  • Learn about the hot issues in the education IT market
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  1. Hear directly from CIOs and technology leaders from area school districts
  2. Network with fellow industry leaders in the region
  3. Learn about the hot issues in the education IT market
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437031412623{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"] Auburn supports providing quality training for its teachers and staff surrounding the use of available technology within the district. [/vc_column_text][vc_tta_tabs color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Location" tab_id="1437031484190-45131b5d-42f7"][vc_column_text] Highline Public Schools is committed to instruction, pedagogy, operational fortitude, blended learning and personalized learning. Highline is using blended learning apps to support its curriculum and is looking for ways to increase productivity through the use of technology. Auburn School District #408 is committed to encouraging and supporting the integration and use of technology in education. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Event target" tab_id="1437031484540-8e1faf14-d9b1"][vc_column_text] This segment will include a Center for Digital Education market briefing on trends and opportunities in K-12. Attendees will receive an overview of the latest research that the Center has gathered in the past year through interviews, Special Reports, events and its annual Digital School Districts Survey. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Next-Gen Higher Education Students – Have They Arrived?
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_right" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437042847231{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"] Next gen learning will take root more broadly than it is today when we focus on six dimensionsâ€”define, measure, design, implement, enable, scale. [/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="NEXT GEN LEARNING" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437042881179{margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_tta_tour color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Learning is" tab_id="1437042866630-4af7c49e-c483"][vc_column_text]
  • Personalized to the ways I learn best
  • Flexible so that I can try different ways to learn
  • Interactive and engaging so that I participate in the learning
  • Relevant to the life Iâ€™d like to lead
  • Organized around my own progress against goals I understand
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Event format" tab_id="1437042866942-4407418d-cb4d"][vc_column_text]
  • Collaborative with teachers and peers, unlimited by proximity
  • Agile and supportive when I need extra help
  • Challenging but achievable, with opportunities to become expert in an area of interest
  • Available to me as much as it is to every other student
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tour][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437042852128{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"] Only then will next generation learning help more students complete high school and college, at a reasonable cost. [/vc_column_text][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-right sidebar-area"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Next gen learning will take root more broadly than it is today when we focus on six dimensions—define, measure, design, implement, enable, scale.

","editor":"

Next gen learning will take root more broadly than it is today when we focus on six dimensions—define, measure, design, implement, enable, scale.

[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="default" el_class="sidebar-area-left sidebar-area"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4" el_class="vc_sidebar_position_left" offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_col-sm-12"][stm_event_info][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437031969916{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"] Nothing can compare to attending an official Conscious Discipline event! The connections you make, the information you learn and the changes you experience at a live event are truly transformational! [/vc_column_text][vc_tta_tabs color="blue" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Location" tab_id="1437031484190-45131b5d-42f7"][vc_column_text] It revolutionizes the classroom approach to social-emotional learning by addressing the adult`s skill set and internal states first, and then empowering the adult to teach and model these skills with children. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Event target" tab_id="1437031484540-8e1faf14-d9b1"][vc_column_text] Both research studies and individual testimonials show that Conscious Discipline simply works for transforming social-emotional skills, school climate, academics and home/school connections. Stop struggling with behaviors and standards, and start finding the joy in teaching again! [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][vc_custom_heading text="Whatâ€™s new:" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1437112719568{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 19px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1435906073173{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Activities and assessments
  • Updated brain information
  • Updated skills and strategies
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • New sections addressing MTSS
  • Organized around safety, connection and problem solving for ease of application
  • Chapter summaries and implementation checklists
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1437031412623{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"] Auburn supports providing quality training for its teachers and staff surrounding the use of available technology within the district. [/vc_column_text][stm_multy_separator css=".vc_custom_1435906305578{margin-top: 54px !important;margin-bottom: 38px !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code="JTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTI3c3RfZmFjZWJvb2tfbGFyZ2UlMjclMjBkaXNwbGF5VGV4dCUzRCUyNyUyNyUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjdzdF90d2l0dGVyX2xhcmdlJTI3JTIwZGlzcGxheVRleHQlM0QlMjclMjclM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNF"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Master Study!

Online studies are designed for students whose scheduling commitments would otherwise make it difficult to enroll in a full-time higher education program. Offered for individual courses, diplomas, associateâ€™s degrees and certificate programs, online studies are a valuable option. The resulting qualification a graduate receives after successfully completing.

Online Courses with full discount systems.

Online Certificates which can be used worldwide.

 Skills Contact Us Skills

Professional Certificate Courses (Online)

  • Online certificates can be obtained in a range of specialized areas.
  • Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study with LMS.
  • Online associate degrees usually take approximately two years then.
  • Online preparatory year programs are an opportunity for students.
  • Online Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications.
Contact Us

Professional Certificate Courses (Offline)

  • Online certificates can be obtained in a range of specialized areas.
  • Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study with LMS.
  • Online associate degrees usually take approximately two years then.
  • Online preparatory year programs are an opportunity for students.
  • Online Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications.

Certifications

Google Certified Microsoft Certified Apple Certified

item.title: Body Cameras on Public-School Educators
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][stm_post_info css=".vc_custom_1437111129257{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study at a community college, technical school or university. If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Unordered & Ordered Lists" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1533803602900{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Associate degrees usually take approximately two years.
  • Offered at schools in Germany, Italy, the Netherlands.
  • The web-based study format opens doors to studying.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  1. Like most certificate programs, online undergraduate.
  2. Online certificate programs are more flexible and accessible.
  3. You can find online certificates in a wide variety of undergraduate.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Studies are designed for students whose scheduling commitments would otherwise make it difficult to enroll in a full-time higher education program. Offered for individual courses, diplomas, associateâ€™s degrees and certificate programs, online studies are a valuable option.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code=""][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_post_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][/vc_row]

If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Unordered & Ordered Lists" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1533803602900{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Studies are designed for students whose scheduling commitments would otherwise make it difficult to enroll in a full-time higher education program. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student."},"widgetType":"text-editor","elements":null},{"origin":"vc_custom_heading","id":"62548f7","elType":"widget","settings":{"text":"Unordered & Ordered Lists","font_container":"tag:h3|text_align:left","google_fonts":"font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal","font_container_data":{"values":[]},"font_container_tag":"h3","font_container_text_align":"left","content":"","stm_title_font_weight":"400"},"widgetType":"vc_custom_heading"},{"origin":"vc_row_inner","id":"6254c69","elType":"section","settings":{"css":".vc_custom_1533803602900{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}","margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","left":"0","right":"0","bottom":"15","isLinked":false,"units":"px"},"padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","left":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","isLinked":false},"background_background":"classic","background_color":"","background_image":{"url":"","id":""},"background_position":"","background_attachment":"","background_repeat":"no-repeat","background_size":"cover","border_radius":{"unit":"px","top":"0","left":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0"},"border_border":"","border_width":{"unit":"px","top":"0","left":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_inner","id":"62550ce","elType":"column","settings":{"width":"1/2","_inline_size_tablet":50,"_inline_size":50,"_column_size":50},"elements":[{"origin":"vc_column_text","id":"62554d4","elType":"widget","settings":{"content":"

item.title: Our main target is to “Developing Yourself as a Leader”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][stm_post_info css=".vc_custom_1437111129257{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Online diplomas are awarded for one to two years of study at a community college, technical school or university. If determined, students can complete an online diploma program while continuing to work, care for loved ones or fulfill other commitments. Online diploma programs are highly practical, allowing students to study a specific area, with a thorough overview of the field.
Associate degrees usually take approximately two years when studying full time and are available at community colleges and technical schools around the world
Summer courses are a great way to gain qualifications and academic credits in a convenient format. Offered during the summer months while some working professionals and students are taking a break, online summer courses fit nicely into a busy schedule. The web-based study format opens doors to studying at a university that is geographically distant, or at times that are most convenient for each individual student.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Unordered & Ordered Lists" font_container="tag:h3|text_align:left" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1533803602900{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Associate degrees usually take approximately two years.
  • Offered at schools in Germany, Italy, the Netherlands.
  • The web-based study format opens doors to studying.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  1. Like most certificate programs, online undergraduate.
  2. Online certificate programs are more flexible and accessible.
  3. You can find online certificates in a wide variety of undergraduate.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Studies are designed for students whose scheduling commitments would otherwise make it difficult to enroll in a full-time higher education program. Offered for individual courses, diplomas, associateâ€™s degrees and certificate programs, online studies are a valuable option.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_post_tags][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][stm_share code=""][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_post_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Materialism in Design Animation
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706322004{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Achieve Hollywood best quality visuals out of the box.
  • With complete C++ source code access, you can study.
  • Comes with designer-friendly Blueprint visual scripting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706426175{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Unreal Engine provides Robust Multiplayer Framework.
  • The built-in Cascade visual effects editor enables particles.
  • Unreal Engine 4`s Material Editor makes use of physically-based.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

What is the target audience?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Masterstudy LMS is a feature-rich WP product from StylemixThemes developed specifically for educational needs. Its main purpose is helping you to build an eLearning website with online courses like Udemy on WordPress. It doesnâ€™t require any programming skills and has an intuitive, simple interface.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Section 1: Introduction to Unreal engine 4,4451,3321,2782,Section 2: Middle Engine checking ,2631,724,199,Section 3: Ray Tracing overview,3076,3072,3066

Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. Vulcan News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide GUI (free extension for UE4) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processes everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

Continue Your Learning with our 30 Day App Challenge

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. So there you have it. 30 days to make and publish your app. There`s never been a better time to get started.
  2. Good luck and please post your questions to the community. Let`s all help each other make some great apps this month!

See you in the course!

[{"question":"What are Unreal Dev Grants?","answer":"Epic has created a $5,000,000 development fund to provide financial grants to interesting and innovative projects built in and around Unreal Engine 4. Awards range from $5,000 to $50,000, and there are no strings attached: you continue to own your IP, are free to publish however you wish, and can use the grant funds without any restrictions or obligations to Epic."},{"question":"How much do I have to pay for Unreal Engine 4?","answer":"UE4 is free to use, with a 5% royalty on gross product revenue after the first $3,000 per game per calendar quarter from commercial products. Read the EULA FAQ for more details. Contact us if you require custom terms."},{"question":"Can I create Unreal Engine 4 videos or streams and use them to generate YouTube?","answer":"Yes. You can earn advertising revenue or Twitch donations from Unreal Engine 4 videos and publish to YouTube. No royalty is owed on this revenue."},{"question":"How do I submit Unreal Engine 4 code changes back to Epic?","answer":"GitHub is our channel through which a growing number of contributors can fork and modify the engine. Source code changes you check in at GitHub will be visible to the community. If you submit a pull request to Epic, we`ll review it and consider inclusion of your code into mainline UE4. If we ship your contribution, we`ll gladly add your name to the credits in the engine."},{"question":"Does Epic really give everyone the entire C++ source code for UE4?","answer":"Yes. Access to full C++ source code for UE4 is included from the moment you create an account and install the engine. You can download source code from GitHub, and you will continue to receive regular updates, including access to live source code changes. Even if you donâ€™t plan to modify the source, itâ€™s super-useful to have it available to understand and debug interactions between your C++ code and the engineâ€™s C++ code!"},{"question":"What platforms are supported?","answer":"Unreal Engine 4 enables you to deploy projects to Windows PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, AR, VR, Linux, SteamOS, and HTML5. You can run the Unreal Editor on Windows, OS X and Linux. Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and NIntendo Switch console tools and code are available at no additional cost to developers who are registered developers for their respective platform(s)."},{"question":"What support resources are available?","answer":"View the Support page for the most comprehensive information regarding how you can get help and information for development with the Unreal Engine. If you`re a custom licensee (meaning you have a UE4 license agreement with Epic other than the free EULA), you should ask your questions at the Unreal Developer Network (login required)."},{"question":"What are Unreal Engine 4`s system requirements?","answer":"For developing with UE4, we recommend a desktop PC with Windows 7 64-bit or a Mac with Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later, 8 GB RAM and a quad-core Intel or AMD processor, and a DX11 compatible video card. UE4 will run on desktops and laptops below these recommendations, but performance may be limited."},{"question":"I work for a game company that doesnâ€™t use Unreal","answer":"Yes, the EULA is very liberal in this regard. It doesnâ€™t contain a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). Youâ€™re free to use, learn from, and freely discuss the Unreal Engine even if youâ€™re developing a competing product or technology."},{"question":"What`s the Unreal Engine EULA ","answer":"The Unreal Engine 4 EULA is a legal document which youâ€™re agreeing to when you sign up for the Unreal Engine. It governs your use of the Unreal Engine, and also describes your rights and obligations when you build games or other products using the engine. Download the EULA as a PDF here."}]

item.title: The Right Set for Landscape Photography
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706322004{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Achieve Hollywood best quality visuals out of the box.
  • With complete C++ source code access, you can study.
  • Comes with designer-friendly Blueprint visual scripting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706426175{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Unreal Engine provides Robust Multiplayer Framework.
  • The built-in Cascade visual effects editor enables particles.
  • Unreal Engine 4`s Material Editor makes use of physically-based.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

What is the target audience?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The WordPress plugin is a part of the Masterstudy WordPress theme for the education business. Upgrading to the theme is optional but does come with additional benefits and functions, and create a perfect match with the plugin.

Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. Vulcan News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide GUI (free extension for UE4) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processes everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

Continue Your Learning with our 30 Day App Challenge

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. So there you have it. 30 days to make and publish your app. There`s never been a better time to get started.
  2. Good luck and please post your questions to the community. Let`s all help each other make some great apps this month!

See you in the course!

[{"question":"What are Unreal Dev Grants?","answer":"Epic has created a $5,000,000 development fund to provide financial grants to interesting and innovative projects built in and around Unreal Engine 4.Awards range from $5,000 to $50,000, and there are no strings attached: you continue to own your IP, are free to publish however you wish, and can use the grant funds without any restrictions or obligations to Epic."},{"question":"How much do I have to pay for Unreal Engine 4?","answer":"UE4 is free to use, with a 5% royalty on gross product revenue after the first $3,000 per game per calendar quarter from commercial products. Read the EULA FAQ for more details. Contact us if you require custom terms."},{"question":"Can I create Unreal Engine 4 videos or streams and use them to generate YouTube?","answer":"Yes. You can earn advertising revenue or Twitch donations from Unreal Engine 4 videos and publish to YouTube. No royalty is owed on this revenue."},{"question":"How do I submit Unreal Engine 4 code changes back to Epic?","answer":"GitHub is our channel through which a growing number of contributors can fork and modify the engine. Source code changes you check in at GitHub will be visible to the community. If you submit a pull request to Epic, we`ll review it and consider inclusion of your code into mainline UE4. If we ship your contribution, we`ll gladly add your name to the credits in the engine."},{"question":"Does Epic really give everyone the entire C++ source code for UE4?","answer":"Yes. Access to full C++ source code for UE4 is included from the moment you create an account and install the engine. You can download source code from GitHub, and you will continue to receive regular updates, including access to live source code changes. Even if you donâ€™t plan to modify the source, itâ€™s super-useful to have it available to understand and debug interactions between your C++ code and the engineâ€™s C++ code!"},{"question":"What platforms are supported?","answer":"Unreal Engine 4 enables you to deploy projects to Windows PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, AR, VR, Linux, SteamOS, and HTML5. You can run the Unreal Editor on Windows, OS X and Linux. Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and NIntendo Switch console tools and code are available at no additional cost to developers who are registered developers for their respective platform(s)."},{"question":"What support resources are available?","answer":"View the Support page for the most comprehensive information regarding how you can get help and information for development with the Unreal Engine. If you`re a custom licensee (meaning you have a UE4 license agreement with Epic other than the free EULA), you should ask your questions at the Unreal Developer Network (login required)."},{"question":"What are Unreal Engine 4`s system requirements?","answer":"For developing with UE4, we recommend a desktop PC with Windows 7 64-bit or a Mac with Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later, 8 GB RAM and a quad-core Intel or AMD processor, and a DX11 compatible video card. UE4 will run on desktops and laptops below these recommendations, but performance may be limited."},{"question":"I work for a game company that doesnâ€™t use Unreal","answer":"Yes, the EULA is very liberal in this regard. It doesnâ€™t contain a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). Youâ€™re free to use, learn from, and freely discuss the Unreal Engine even if youâ€™re developing a competing product or technology."},{"question":"What`s the Unreal Engine EULA ","answer":"The Unreal Engine 4 EULA is a legal document which youâ€™re agreeing to when you sign up for the Unreal Engine. It governs your use of the Unreal Engine, and also describes your rights and obligations when you build games or other products using the engine. Download the EULA as a PDF here."}]

item.title: Complete Web Development in 1 Bundle!
item.content:encoded:
Learn Complete Web Development in 1 Bundle by learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, PHP, MYSQL and WordPress.

In this course you will learn complete web Development from basic to advance level. We will learn HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Jquery, Ajax and PHP. After learning from this course you will be able to work as a web developer or a web designer. This course is for all kind of students both beginners and experts. Because at the first, i will teach the basic stuff to those students who don't know anything about these languages and coding. Then i will teach you by creating different web development projects of every language professionally. I will also provide all of these Web project's source code so you can play around with the source code. You can download these projects and follow the code while i am teaching. I will teach all of these projects by writing and executing code right in front of your eyes and I will explain every single line of code.

These languages are used to create the layouts of websites. The HTML5 is just used to link the data in the pages and CSS3 is used for giving the style to our web pages. I'm going to teach you both of these languages in this section then we will make 5 web development projects. We will code 5 websites in front of your eyes and I will explain every single line of code and you can download these websites and follow the code. If you have any question while learning you will be able to add question in the discussion area. I will reply to all of your questions ASAP.

So those were the key advantages of a responsive website. This section covers everything you need to build responsive websites with minimum effort. You can download the source code of website and follow it with the lectures.If you have any question while learning you will be able to add question in the discussion area. I will reply to all of your questions ASAP.

Â

item.title: Trading Basics (3-Course Bundle)
item.content:encoded:
The first 3 Options Trading Strategies courses are combined to create this bundle. To master the basics of Options, you really need all three courses.Â  A brief synopsis of the options trading strategies courses are provided below.

Most people learning Options for the first time face too much jargon and complex language. This options trading strategies course use real-world examples (buying a house) to explain how a Call Option (Section 1) works in real life. This example should make it absolutely clear what a Call Option is in step-by-step details.Â 

The Put Option is the ultimate "protector" of your portfolio, and in this course you can learn how Put Options work. It is the exact opposite of a Call Option. Put Options increase in value when the value of a stock or index drops in price. We define what a Put Option, and just like we did in the Call Option, we consider a real-world example of a Put Option.Â

item.title: Stock Trading & Investing for Beginners 4-in-1 Course Bundle
item.content:encoded:
This ultimate stock trading and investing course bundle has been specifically designed for beginners / investors new to stock trading or investing in stock market. In a single course we cover:Â 

  • Newbie real estate investors
  • Experienced commercial and/or residential real estate investors
  • People that want to invest in House Flips, Rental Properties or Apartments
  • Those that want to invest in commercial warehouses, parking lots, retail properties, etcâ€¦
  • Great for private investors and investment teams
  • Real Estate Agents Seeking Tools to Appeal to Investor Audience
  • MBA Students, iBankers, Financial Analysts
  • Someone who wants an in depth and broad coverage of real estate investment analysis concepts and techniques

item.title: The New Fundamentals of Management (5 Course Bundle)
item.content:encoded:
Save over 20% by buying all five courses!Â  What is The New Fundamentlas of Management? This bundle is a series of programs designed to provide new or experienced managers with the skills they need to achieve their business objectives while enhancing the performance and development of their employees.Â Who uses Everyday Change Management?Â Newly promoted managers and existing managers

Description:Â Collectively,Â The New Foundations of ManagementÂ series provides the opportunity for any leader to create a solid set of leadership skills they need to achieve their business objectives while enhancing the performance and development of their employees. In addition, she/he will be building a strong foundation for them to continue to grow and develop on their leadership journey.

item.title: The Complete Communication Skills Master Class for Life
item.content:encoded:
Communication SkillsÂ are the most important personal skills you can ever develop for your success in life. Life is a series of communications. Those who develop strongÂ communicationÂ skillsÂ do well in school, secure jobs and promotions and often ascend to the highest levels of leadership in corporations, governments and civic life. People who fail to developÂ communicationÂ skillsÂ often have their careers stagnate or plateau in the mid-range. Sadly,Â presentation skillsÂ are either not taught in primary or secondary education or are taught poorly.

TheÂ Complete CommunicationÂ Skills Masterclass for Life course is your way to get a Master's levelÂ  education on how to communicateÂ effectively. This course is designed to be a one-stop shop for all your communicationÂ skills training needs. This course covers a vast array of communication needs and scenarios, from how to communicate during a job interview, pitching investors, asking for a raise, speaking one on one or to large groups. And it covers how to speak to big corporationsÂ when you have a problem with service, plus public speaking for kids, how to deliver a wedding speech and even a eulogy. You will also become a master ofÂ persuasion, assertivenessÂ and all aspects ofÂ businessÂ communication.Â YourÂ leadershipÂ abilities will expand dramatically as yourÂ social skillsÂ grow to allow you to communicate effectively in every situation.

item.title: The Complete Business Plan Course (Includes 5 Courses)
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Complete Business Plan Course, which will help you make an incredible business plan from scratch. Everything that you need to make your awesome business plan is included in this course, including 50 business plan templates and an incredibly detailed 13 step process to help you make an entire business plan from scratch!Â 

We guarantee that this is the most thorough business plan course available anywhere on the market. This course and the many exercises in this course are for beginner or advanced users in any country and in any business sector!

By an Award Winning MBA professor who is a top selling online business teacher, top selling author, former Goldman Sachs employee, Columbia MBA and venture capitalist who has invested in and sat on the boards of many companies. He is also the author of the #1 best selling business course on MasterStudy. He has also written many business plans and read hundreds of business plans too and has raised/managed over $1bn in his career.Â

item.title: Master "Technical Analysis and Chart reading skills" Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Technical analysis has become extensive in recent years. We study the psychology of technical analysis and why they work 60 to 70% of the time. There are several categories of technical analysis - Price indicators, Support and Resistance levels, Momentum indicators, Volume indicators, Oscillators and Statistical price movement indicators. We cut through all the noise and show you why there are 4 or 5 indicators you should study and that's all you really need to make informed entry and exit decisions. Technical analysis is a self-fulfilling prophecy and gives deep insight into crowd behavior.Â  Here's what we'll learn in the course:

  • The JavaScript language itself
  • The Web Browser Environment
  • The Node.js environment
  • The Express framework for creating servers
  • User registration &Â user-generated content
  • ... and much more!

We encourage you to watch the freely available first lesson titled "Where Do We Begin?" to get a better feel for the course. Technical analysis is a self-fulfilling prophecy and gives deep insight into crowd behavior.

item.title: Web Development for Beginners 5-in-1 Course Bundle
item.content:encoded:
If you are someone looking to quickly get started in the stock market then this may be just the right course for you.Â This course is specifically designed for beginners so that they can find all the relevant information in one place. This course is regularly updated as you can read below.

August 2019 Update: New videos uploaded for the financial analysis section. August 2018 Update:Â Added a new course Introduction to Options in this bundle which covers basics of Options! 21 new videos. Another 90 minutes of content to understand option basics for stock trading better!

October 23rd 2017 Update: Added Benjamin Graham's Value Investing Strategy. Benjamin Graham is widely known as father of value investing. In a new section added to this course now, you can also learn essential details of Benjamin Graham's advice on stock selection, and his quantitative criteria for picking stocks.

item.title: Office 365 Administration
item.content:encoded: This course is designed to give users a tour and understanding of the administrative capabilities in Office 365. In this course, we will cover the Office 365 interface, setting up a trial of Office 365, navigating the Admin Center, adding and managing users, working with groups and collaboration groups, using group administration, and various other topics related to Office 365 administration. Additionally, understanding Azure rights management, deployment of Office 365 Pro Plus, monitoring of Office 365, creating custom domains, Hybrid Active Directory, Exchange administration, managing SharePoint Online, configuring Skype for Business and performing connectivity tests will be covered. Updated 5/4/2019

item.title: Learn JavaScript: Full-Stack from Scratch
item.content:encoded:
Learn the incredibly popular and in demand JavaScript language. This course makes no assumptions of prior computer programming experience. We begin with the very basics and slowly but surely work our way up to writing JavaScript code to power every aspect of an application.Â  Â Here's what we'll learn in the course:

  • The JavaScript language itself
  • The Web Browser Environment
  • The Node.js environment
  • The Express framework for creating servers
  • User registration &Â user-generated content
  • ... and much more!

We encourage you to watch the freely available first lesson titled "Where Do We Begin?" to get a better feel for the course.

item.title: Programming For Beginners Bundle Course
item.content:encoded:
R is the most widely used tool for statistical programming. It is powerful, versatile and easy to use. It is the first choice for thousands of data analysts working in both companies and academia. This course will help you master the basics of R in a short time, as a first step to become a skilled R data scientist. Â 

The course is meant for absolute beginners, so you donâ€™t have to know anything about R before starting. (You donâ€™t even have to have the R program on your computer; I will show you how to install it.) But after graduating this course you will have the most important R programming skills â€“ and you will be able to further develop these skills, by practicing, starting from what you will have learned in the course.Â  Â 

In the first section of this course you willÂ get startedÂ with R: you will install the program (in case you didnâ€™t do it already), you will familiarize with the working interface in R Studio and you will learn some basic technical stuff like installing and activating packages or setting the working directory. Moreover, you will learn how to perform simple operations in R and how to work with variables. Â 

The next five sections will be dedicated to the five types ofÂ data structuresÂ in R: vectors, matrices, lists, factors and data frames. So youâ€™ll learn how to manipulate data structures: how to index them, how to edit data, how to filter data according to various criteria, how to create and modify objects (or variables), how to apply functions to data and much more. These are very important topics, because R is a software for statistical computing and most of the R programming is about manipulating data. So before getting to more advanced statistical analyses in R you must know the basic techniques of data handling. Â

item.title: The Complete Stock Trading Bundle Course
item.content:encoded:
This is the same introductory course that our Full-Time Traders at the Proprietary Trading Firm MontrealÂ Trading Group have taken before being employed by the company.Â 

This course not only includes the material that is required to be successful in Trading but also the way that we interpret theÂ different types of information in real time to make the best Trading decisions possible.

So whether you want to generate some side income by trading stocks or if you want to make trading your only source of income (like our Traders), then this course is for you.Â 

In This course we will cover beginner and Intermediary level information to get you on the right path to becoming a successful and consistently profitable Trader. On top of all the material thought we will be giving you our personal tricks, techniques and views on the stock market that have tremendously fast-tracked our success.

item.title: Show Your Passion with Theatre courses
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706322004{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Achieve Hollywood best quality visuals out of the box.
  • With complete C++ source code access, you can study.
  • Comes with designer-friendly Blueprint visual scripting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706426175{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Unreal Engine provides Robust Multiplayer Framework.
  • The built-in Cascade visual effects editor enables particles.
  • Unreal Engine 4`s Material Editor makes use of physically-based.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

What is the target audience?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The Masterstudy LMS is a free plugin but there is a paid PRO version as well. PRO version has everything from the free plugin plus a bunch of premium addons extending the functionality in many ways

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Section 1: Introduction to Unreal engine 4,Section 2: Middle Engine checking ,Section 3: Ray Tracing overview

Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. Vulcan News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide GUI (free extension for UE4) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processes everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

Continue Your Learning with our 30 Day App Challenge

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. So there you have it. 30 days to make and publish your app. There`s never been a better time to get started.
  2. Good luck and please post your questions to the community. Let`s all help each other make some great apps this month!

See you in the course!

[{"question":"What are Unreal Dev Grants?","answer":"Epic has created a $5,000,000 development fund to provide financial grants to interesting and innovative projects built in and around Unreal Engine 4. Awards range from $5,000 to $50,000, and there are no strings attached: you continue to own your IP, are free to publish however you wish, and can use the grant funds without any restrictions or obligations to Epic."},{"question":"How much do I have to pay for Unreal Engine 4?","answer":"UE4 is free to use, with a 5% royalty on gross product revenue after the first $3,000 per game per calendar quarter from commercial products. Read the EULA FAQ for more details. Contact us if you require custom terms. "},{"question":"Can I create Unreal Engine 4 videos or streams and use them to generate YouTube?","answer":"Yes. You can earn advertising revenue or Twitch donations from Unreal Engine 4 videos and publish to YouTube. No royalty is owed on this revenue."},{"question":"How do I submit Unreal Engine 4 code changes back to Epic?","answer":"GitHub is our channel through which a growing number of contributors can fork and modify the engine. Source code changes you check in at GitHub will be visible to the community. If you submit a pull request to Epic, we`ll review it and consider inclusion of your code into mainline UE4. If we ship your contribution, we`ll gladly add your name to the credits in the engine."},{"question":"Does Epic really give everyone the entire C++ source code for UE4?","answer":"Yes. Access to full C++ source code for UE4 is included from the moment you create an account and install the engine. You can download source code from GitHub, and you will continue to receive regular updates, including access to live source code changes. Even if you donâ€™t plan to modify the source, itâ€™s super-useful to have it available to understand and debug interactions between your C++ code and the engineâ€™s C++ code!"},{"question":"What platforms are supported?","answer":"Unreal Engine 4 enables you to deploy projects to Windows PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, AR, VR, Linux, SteamOS, and HTML5. You can run the Unreal Editor on Windows, OS X and Linux. Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and NIntendo Switch console tools and code are available at no additional cost to developers who are registered developers for their respective platform(s)."},{"question":"What support resources are available?","answer":"View the Support page for the most comprehensive information regarding how you can get help and information for development with the Unreal Engine. If you`re a custom licensee (meaning you have a UE4 license agreement with Epic other than the free EULA), you should ask your questions at the Unreal Developer Network (login required)."},{"question":"What are Unreal Engine 4`s system requirements?","answer":"For developing with UE4, we recommend a desktop PC with Windows 7 64-bit or a Mac with Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later, 8 GB RAM and a quad-core Intel or AMD processor, and a DX11 compatible video card. UE4 will run on desktops and laptops below these recommendations, but performance may be limited."},{"question":"I work for a game company that doesnâ€™t use Unreal","answer":"Yes, the EULA is very liberal in this regard. It doesnâ€™t contain a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). Youâ€™re free to use, learn from, and freely discuss the Unreal Engine even if youâ€™re developing a competing product or technology."},{"question":"What`s the Unreal Engine EULA ","answer":"The Unreal Engine 4 EULA is a legal document which youâ€™re agreeing to when you sign up for the Unreal Engine. It governs your use of the Unreal Engine, and also describes your rights and obligations when you build games or other products using the engine. Download the EULA as a PDF here."}]

item.title: Let`s paint Van Gogh`s Starry Night
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

item.title: Concept Art Printing on 3d Printer
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The primary goal of this quick start guide is to introduce you to Unreal Engine 4`s (UE4) development environment. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to set up and develop C++ Projects in UE4. This guide shows you how to create a new Unreal Engine project, add a new C++ class to it, compile the project, and add an instance of a new class to your level. By the time you reach the end of this guide, you`ll be able to see your programmed Actor floating above a table in the level. This quick start guide shows you how to add assets to your Unreal Engine (UE4) games. By the end of this guide, you`ll know how to use the Project Browser to create new projects and navigate the Content Browser to find and add content. You`ll also know where to find information on the FBX Content Pipeline while learning how to use the Material Editor to modify Materials before applying them to a Static Mesh Actor.

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706322004{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Achieve Hollywood best quality visuals out of the box.
  • With complete C++ source code access, you can study.
  • Comes with designer-friendly Blueprint visual scripting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533706426175{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
  • Unreal Engine provides Robust Multiplayer Framework.
  • The built-in Cascade visual effects editor enables particles.
  • Unreal Engine 4`s Material Editor makes use of physically-based.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

What is the target audience?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • You might be thinking, all of the above - and that is fine. But as a complete beginner learning Unreal Engine 4.
  • The rendering system in Unreal Engine 4 is an all-new, DirectX 11 pipeline that includes deferred shading.
Learning a new game engine as a complete beginner is very intimidating. There are a lot of tutorials, documentation and advice already out but how do you start and proceed with learning Unreal Engine 4 is unclear. You get pulled into many different directions and end up confused and overwhelmed. I have spent a lot of time deconstructing what it takes to learn a game engine from scratch. What it is that you should focus on first and what you should avoid until later.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The WordPress plugin is a part of the Masterstudy WordPress theme for the education business. Upgrading to the theme is optional but does come with additional benefits and functions, and create a perfect match with the plugin.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Section 1: Introduction to Unreal engine 4,Section 2: Middle Engine checking ,Section 3: Ray Tracing overview

Productivity Hacks to Get More Done in 2018

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. Vulcan News Feed Eradicator (free chrome extension) Stay focused by removing your Facebook newsfeed and replacing it with an inspirational quote. Disable the tool anytime you want to see what friends are up to!
  2. Hide GUI (free extension for UE4) Stay focused by hiding your inbox. Click "show your inbox" at a scheduled time and batch processes everything one go.
  3. Habitica (free mobile + web app) Gamify your to do list. Treat your life like a game and earn gold goins for getting stuff done!

Continue Your Learning with our 30 Day App Challenge

â€” 28 February 2017

  1. So there you have it. 30 days to make and publish your app. There`s never been a better time to get started.
  2. Good luck and please post your questions to the community. Let`s all help each other make some great apps this month!

See you in the course!

[{"question":"What are Unreal Dev Grants?","answer":"Epic has created a $5,000,000 development fund to provide financial grants to interesting and innovative projects built in and around Unreal Engine 4.Awards range from $5,000 to $50,000, and there are no strings attached: you continue to own your IP, are free to publish however you wish, and can use the grant funds without any restrictions or obligations to Epic."},{"question":"How much do I have to pay for Unreal Engine 4?","answer":"UE4 is free to use, with a 5% royalty on gross product revenue after the first $3,000 per game per calendar quarter from commercial products. Read the EULA FAQ for more details. Contact us if you require custom terms."},{"question":"Can I create Unreal Engine 4 videos or streams and use them to generate YouTube?","answer":"Yes. You can earn advertising revenue or Twitch donations from Unreal Engine 4 videos and publish to YouTube. No royalty is owed on this revenue."},{"question":"How do I submit Unreal Engine 4 code changes back to Epic?","answer":"GitHub is our channel through which a growing number of contributors can fork and modify the engine. Source code changes you check in at GitHub will be visible to the community. If you submit a pull request to Epic, we`ll review it and consider inclusion of your code into mainline UE4. If we ship your contribution, we`ll gladly add your name to the credits in the engine."},{"question":"Does Epic really give everyone the entire C++ source code for UE4?","answer":"Yes. Access to full C++ source code for UE4 is included from the moment you create an account and install the engine. You can download source code from GitHub, and you will continue to receive regular updates, including access to live source code changes. Even if you donâ€™t plan to modify the source, itâ€™s super-useful to have it available to understand and debug interactions between your C++ code and the engineâ€™s C++ code!"},{"question":"What platforms are supported?","answer":"Unreal Engine 4 enables you to deploy projects to Windows PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Mac OS X, iOS, Android, AR, VR, Linux, SteamOS, and HTML5. You can run the Unreal Editor on Windows, OS X and Linux. Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and NIntendo Switch console tools and code are available at no additional cost to developers who are registered developers for their respective platform(s)."},{"question":"What support resources are available?","answer":"View the Support page for the most comprehensive information regarding how you can get help and information for development with the Unreal Engine. If you`re a custom licensee (meaning you have a UE4 license agreement with Epic other than the free EULA), you should ask your questions at the Unreal Developer Network (login required)."},{"question":"What are Unreal Engine 4`s system requirements?","answer":"For developing with UE4, we recommend a desktop PC with Windows 7 64-bit or a Mac with Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later, 8 GB RAM and a quad-core Intel or AMD processor, and a DX11 compatible video card. UE4 will run on desktops and laptops below these recommendations, but performance may be limited."},{"question":"I work for a game company that doesnâ€™t use Unreal","answer":"Yes, the EULA is very liberal in this regard. It doesnâ€™t contain a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). Youâ€™re free to use, learn from, and freely discuss the Unreal Engine even if youâ€™re developing a competing product or technology."},{"question":"What`s the Unreal Engine EULA ","answer":"The Unreal Engine 4 EULA is a legal document which youâ€™re agreeing to when you sign up for the Unreal Engine. It governs your use of the Unreal Engine, and also describes your rights and obligations when you build games or other products using the engine. Download the EULA as a PDF here."}]
