item.title: Management
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The pro version of LMS plugin is included in Masterstudy Theme. It contains a big number of premium features. We constantly work on the new updates and addons and you get all of them if you already purchased the theme. What is more you have a freedom to activate and use only those you need the most.

Each addon has its own pack of setups just to make your work much easier.Â Letâ€™s look through the several addons which help you to manage the operating processes.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="3031" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1582108329279{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"]Prerequisites allow establishing the requirements for taking the course. Only eligible users will be able to enroll and study. In other words students will face several prerequisites to accomplish before taking the course. How exactly you can use this tool. Choose the course as prerequisite and specify the passing percent. In that case, students will be required to complete this course with a particular grade, for example, 75%, to be eligible for taking the next course.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1582029714184{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3054" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Drip Content allows you to release lessons over time, instead of giving learners immediate access. You can lock lessons in sequential order or set your own sequence. Depending on this, students will get access to the 2nd lesson after completing the first one.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3058" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Co-instructor is another interesting option that will help you manage the website work. With this option you can assign one more teacher to the course. Thus, one course will be led by two instructors. Take the chance to get extra help, a workmate to share responsibilities and provide students with more interaction.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3052" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Gradeebook Addon. What a learning activity without grading! We are used to getting marks. In our plugin we provide such services. Instructors can grade students and all their statistics are available in the Gradebook Addon. By using it you can easily manage the students performance, monitor their progress, check students status and courses/quizzes statistics.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3042" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Live Stream. To increase the engaging rate try to adapt to live streaming. The feature is developed to improve the interaction between students and teachers. It has many useful options: Q&A sections, live chat and commenting. While still participating in the lesson, students can ask questions and get detailed answers from a teacher in real-time.
Use platforms like YouTube to broadcast streamings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3048" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Online Testing Addon. In addition to this, there is an Online Testing feature.
By using Online Testing you can paste any quizzes through the shortcode to any page[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3051" img_size="328x273" alignment="center"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Marketing Tools
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Online courses website built with Masterstudy doesnâ€™t limit you just with one option of selling individual courses to individuals.Â You can follow the best marketing practices and sell courses in packages or for groups of people.[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3036" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Course Bundles also work as a good marketing tool. By packing courses into bundle you provide a higher value offer to your students and increase your revenue.
Enable these options from the Addons page and make some setup.

For groups you can specify the number of members allowed in one group and set the price. Easily create new groups by adding users IDs or import the csv file. In bundles settings you are allowed to set the limits for bundles quantity and for number of courses per package.
Easily manage these options right from the front-end builder.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3060" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Trial Courses. This option offers learners free first lesson of the course. It is a perfect option to interest your students before the purchase. By offering them a free trial lesson you can remove all the doubts.
Set the number of free lessons and make them open to the public in the Trial Course Settings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="3040" img_size="328x273"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Group courses are the best choice for you if you want to expand your target audience.
Sell courses to organizations and groups of people. This is a chance to collaborate with a new business segment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Engagement
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Before creating Masterstudy, we did thorough research and found out that more often education products lack good content and have low engagement rate. Because of this reason we decided to add more options which allow you to diversify your content. This includes different lesson types (see lesson 2 for more details), question types (see lesson 3), ability to use media files of various formats and several addons we will be describing in the lesson. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Statistics & Payout Addon. Control your site finances with an accurate Financial System. It is a strong management of sales with the statistics data and the ability to set auto payouts with cron and award your contributors.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Points System. Another method to interest students is to enable the Points System. This function allows to reward learners with points for different kinds of activities on the website. Once they gain a needed amount of points, they can redeem points for courses. You just need to identify the number of points that will be equal to $1.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Assignment. One more option that boost learning activity is Assignment. It includes two types of tasks you can ask learners to complete. These are essays and uploads, where students can attach files required. Regulate the number of attachments and maximum size of files to upload. Specify it in the Assignments settings. You can add assignments right from the course Curriculum or from the Assignment menu.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Messaging and Announcement System. Use a simple interface, make announcements and use a messaging system to keep students informed. Let them enjoy maximum care and assistance through a private messaging system and an internal social network. User-friendly messaging and announcements system will help your students and lecturers share their knowledge and keep in touch with each other.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
